title: Ayton Back With Suns, New Star In The Empire State?
description:
Brian Windhorst is joined by ESPN's Tim MacMahon and Tim Bontemps to discuss Deandre Ayton signing back with Phoenix, what this means for Kevin Durant’s trade possibilities, if KD and Kyrie may wind up back together again in Brooklyn after all and if Donovan Mitchell could be a Knick by next week.

itunes:subtitle: Hoop Collective: Deandre Ayton Signing Back With The Suns, Mitchell To The Empire State?
